title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Faulty Electrical
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A tech entrepreneur charging his laptop in a rain-damaged hostel bathroom is electrocuted when faulty wiring turns a puddle into a death trap.

death_teaser: In the startup world, they called him a disruptor. The 220 volts disrupted him right back.
